titleStmt.title: Remains of that reverend & faithful servant of Jesus Christ, Mr. William Fenner, late minister of Rochford in Essex ... now compared with his own notes and published by Simeon Ash, William Taylor, Matthew Poole, John Jackson and John Seabrooke ...
titleStmt.author: Fenner, William, 1600-1640.

titleStmt.title: Remains of that reverend & faithful servant of Jesus Christ, Mr. William Fenner, late minister of Rochford in Essex ... now compared with his own notes and published by Simeon Ash, William Taylor, Matthew Poole, John Jackson and John Seabrooke ...
titleStmt.author: Fenner, William, 1600-1640.
Ashe, Simeon, d. 1662.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.

(from t.p.) A continuation of his Allarm to drowsie saints -- A treatise of effectuall calling -- The killing power of the law -- The spirituall watch -- The new birth -- A Christians ingrafting into Christ -- A treatise on the Sabbath.
